title: Apollophanes
content:
APOLLOPHANES

A Syrian warrior during the period between the Old Testament and New Testament. The army of Judas Maccabeus killed Apollophanes at a fortress named Gazara (2 Maccabees 10:37). Apollophanes's death happened after an important battle. In the battle, the Jewish army relied on the Lord for victory. However, the Syrians fought from violent uncontrolled anger (2 Maccabees 10:24â€“31).
